Text:
Hello!
Did anybody try listening this?
I have a very poor sound quality (almost unhearable)....
May be a codec problem?
Can someone help me?

I'm trying to listen it with Amarok, under Ubuntu 10.04.

Thx!

Make sure that surround sound is actually set up and working correctly in your Ubuntu. Try it with maybe an ordinary DVD-movie first, and check that rear speakers sound correct. Google it if you don't know how.

Then try the surround flac files in VLC.
